publications.title: Local Dataset: Self-Supervised Learning with 2D-3D Correspondences
publications.authors: Feiyang Ma, Local Collaborator A, Local Collaborator B
publications.venue: Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (CVPR)
publications.imageAlt: Autonomous driving with LiDAR point clouds
publications.description: Local storage dataset: Novel self-supervised learning approach leveraging 2D-3D correspondences for robust representation learning in autonomous driving scenarios.

publications.title: Local Dataset: Geometric Deep Learning for Robotics
publications.description: Local storage dataset: Introduces SE(3) equivariant geometric priors for sample-efficient robot manipulation learning with better generalization.

publications.title: Local Dataset: Neural Scene Understanding at Scale
publications.authors: Feiyang Ma, Local Researcher D, Local Researcher E
publications.description: Local storage dataset: Comprehensive deep learning framework for 3D scene understanding including semantic and instance segmentation in point clouds.
